analysis.description:
DarknodeRegistry.epoch (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#997-1039) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- previousEpoch.blocknumber == 0

DarknodeRegistry.register (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#957-973) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ren.transfer(address(store),_bond) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#962-963)

DarknodeRegistry.slash (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1087-1109) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ren.transfer(store.darknodeOwner(_challenger1),reward) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1107-1108)
	-ren.transfer(store.darknodeOwner(_challenger2),reward) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1108-1109)

DarknodeRegistry.refund (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1116-1128) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ren.transfer(darknodeOwner,amount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1126-1127)

DarknodeRegistry.getDarknodesFromEpochs has external calls inside a loop:
	- next = store.next(next) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol)

DarknodeRegistry.getDarknodesFromEpochs has external calls inside a loop:
	- next = store.next(next) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol)

Reentrancy in DarknodeRegistry.deregister (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#981-993):
	External calls:
	- store.updateDarknodeDeregisteredAt(_darknodeID,currentEpoch.blocknumber + minimumEpochInterval) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#986-989)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numDarknodesNextEpoch (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#991)

Reentrancy in DarknodeRegistry.register (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#957-973):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(ren.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_bond),bond transfer failed) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#962)
	- ren.transfer(address(store),_bond) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#962-963)
	- store.appendDarknode(_darknodeID,msg.sender,_bond,_publicKey,currentEpoch.blocknumber + minimumEpochInterval,0) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#964-971)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numDarknodesNextEpoch (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#971)

Reentrancy in DarknodeRegistry.slash (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1087-1109):
	External calls:
	- penalty = store.darknodeBond(_prover) / 2 (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1089-1090)
	- store.updateDarknodeBond(_prover,penalty) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1091-1092)
	- isDeregisterable(_prover) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1095-1103)
	- store.updateDarknodeDeregisteredAt(_prover,currentEpoch.blocknumber + minimumEpochInterval) (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1097-1100)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numDarknodesNextEpoch (/unique_chucks/6/0x34bd421c7948bc16f826fd99f9b785929b121633.sol#1100)
